derivation: from G4012 (περιαιρέω) and G138 (περιαιρέω) (including its alternate);
strongs_def: to remove all around, i.e. unveil, cast off (anchor); figuratively, to expiate
outline:
1. to take away that which surrounds or envelopes a thing
  2. metaph. to take away altogether or entirely
    1. the guilt of sin, to expiate perfectly
